components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in US via a subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in US via a subset of Short Codes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in US via a subset of Short Codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in US via a subset of Short Codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic SMS Carrier Maintenance - O2

incident_updates.body:
The O2 network in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 January 2026 at 16:00 PST until 06 January 2026 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from O2 Czech Republic handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 January 2026 at 21:00 PST until 07 January 2026 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 January 2026 at 20:00 PST until 08 January 2026 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner EE United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 January 2026 at 15:00 PST until 11 January 2026 at 19:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 January 2026 at 01:00 PST until 12 January 2026 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from T-Mobile, Verizon and AT&T United States handsets via United States short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 12 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 28 January 2026 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

12 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 12 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
14 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 14 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
19 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 19 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
21 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 21 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
26 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 26 January 2026 at 16:00 PST
28 January 2026 at 12:00 PST until 28 January 2026 at 16:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned maintenance in all regions between 8:00 am and 10:00 am Pacific Time on 01/14/2026. During the maintenance window, customers will experience docs and code-exchange user site degradation. These will stuill be usable.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 January 2026 at 14:15 PST until 06 January 2026 at 19:15 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes, Lookup Identity Match

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
